verses.verse: Let brotherly love <WG5360> continue. <WG3306>
Be not forgetful <WG1950> <WG3361> to entertain strangers: <WG5381> for <WG1063> thereby <WG1223> <WG5026> some <WG5100> have entertained <WG3579> angels <WG32> unawares. <WG2990>

Remember <WG3403> them that are in bonds, <WG1198> as <WG5613> bound with <WG4887> them; and them which suffer adversity, <WG2558> as <WG5613> being <WG5607> yourselves <WG848> also <WG2532> in <WG1722> the body. <WG4983>

Marriage <WG1062> is honorable <WG5093> in <WG1722> all, <WG3956> and <WG2532> the <WG3588> bed <WG2845> undefiled: <WG283> but <WG1161> whoremongers <WG4205> and <WG2532> adulterers <WG3432> God <WG2316> will judge. <WG2919>

Let your conversation <WG5158> be without covetousness; <WG866> and be content <WG714> with such things as ye have: <WG3918> for <WG1063> he <WG846> hath said, <WG2046> I will never <WG3364> leave <WG447> thee, <WG4571> nor <WG3761> forsake <WG1459> thee. <WG4571>

So that <WG5620> we <WG2248> may boldly <WG2292> say, <WG3004> The Lord <WG2962> is my <WG1698> helper, <WG998> and <WG2532> I will not <WG3756> fear <WG5399> what <WG5101> man <WG444> shall do <WG4160> unto me. <WG3427>

Remember <WG3421> them which have the rule over <WG2233> you, <WG5216> who <WG3748> have spoken <WG2980> unto you <WG5213> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of God: <WG2316> whose <WG3739> faith <WG4102> follow, <WG3401> considering <WG333> the <WG3588> end <WG1545> of their conversation. <WG391>
Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> the <WG3588> same <WG846> yesterday, <WG5504> and <WG2532> today, <WG4594> and <WG2532> forever. <WG1519> <WG165>

Be not <WG3361> carried about <WG4064> with divers <WG4164> and <WG2532> strange <WG3581> doctrines. <WG1322> For <WG1063> it is a good thing <WG2570> that the <WG3588> heart <WG2588> be established <WG950> with grace; <WG5485> not <WG3756> with meats, <WG1033> which <WG3739> have not <WG3756> profited <WG5623> them that have been occupied therein. <WG4043>
We have <WG2192> an altar, <WG2379> whereof <WG1537> <WG3739> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> right <WG1849> to eat <WG5315> which serve <WG3000> the <WG3588> tabernacle. <WG4633>

For <WG1063> the <WG3588> bodies <WG4983> of those <WG5130> beasts, <WG2226> whose <WG3739> blood <WG129> is brought <WG1533> into <WG1519> the <WG3588> sanctuary <WG39> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> high priest <WG749> for <WG4012> sin, <WG266> are burned <WG2618> without <WG1854> the <WG3588> camp. <WG3925>

Wherefore <WG1352> Jesus <WG2424> also, <WG2532> that <WG2443> he might sanctify <WG37> the <WG3588> people <WG2992> with <WG1223> his own <WG2398> blood, <WG129> suffered <WG3958> without <WG1854> the <WG3588> gate. <WG4439>
Let us go forth <WG1831> therefore <WG5106> unto <WG4314> him <WG846> without <WG1854> the <WG3588> camp, <WG3925> bearing <WG5342> his <WG846> reproach. <WG3680>
For <WG1063> here <WG5602> have <WG2192> we no <WG3756> continuing <WG3306> city, <WG4172> but <WG235> we seek <WG1934> one to come. <WG3195>

By <WG1223> him <WG846> therefore <WG3767> let us offer <WG399> the sacrifice <WG2378> of praise <WG133> to God <WG2316> continually, <WG1275> that is, <WG5123> the fruit <WG2590> of our lips <WG5491> giving thanks <WG3670> to his <WG846> name. <WG3686>
But <WG1161> to do good <WG2140> and <WG2532> to communicate <WG2842> forget <WG1950> not: <WG3361> for <WG1063> with such <WG5108> sacrifices <WG2378> God <WG2316> is well pleased. <WG2100>

Obey <WG3982> them that have the rule over <WG2233> you, <WG5216> and <WG2532> submit <WG5226> yourselves: for <WG1063> they <WG846> watch <WG69> for <WG5228> your <WG5216> souls, <WG5590> as <WG5613> they that must give <WG591> account, <WG3056> that <WG2443> they may do <WG4160> it <WG5124> with <WG3326> joy, <WG5479> and <WG2532> not <WG3361> with grief: <WG4727> for <WG1063> that <WG5124> is unprofitable <WG255> for you. <WG5213>

Pray <WG4336> for <WG4012> us: <WG2257> for <WG1063> we trust <WG3982> we <WG3754> have <WG2192> a good <WG2570> conscience, <WG4893> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> willing <WG2309> to live honestly. <WG390> <WG2573>
But <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you the rather <WG4056> to do <WG4160> this, <WG5124> that <WG2443> I may be restored <WG600> to you <WG5213> the sooner. <WG5032>

Now <WG1161> the <WG3588> God <WG2316> of peace, <WG1515> that brought again <WG321> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498> our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus, <WG2424> that great <WG3173> shepherd <WG4166> of the <WG3588> sheep, <WG4263> through <WG1722> the blood <WG129> of the everlasting <WG166> covenant, <WG1242>

Make you perfect <WG2675> <WG5209> in <WG1722> every <WG3956> good <WG18> work <WG2041> to do <WG4160> his <WG848> will, <WG2307> working <WG4160> in <WG1722> you <WG5213> that which is wellpleasing <WG2101> in his sight, <WG1799> <WG848> through <WG1223> Jesus <WG2424> Christ; <WG5547> to whom <WG3739> be glory <WG1391> forever and ever. <WG1519> <WG165> <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

And <WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you, <WG5209> brethren, <WG80> suffer <WG430> the <WG3588> word <WG3056> of exhortation: <WG3874> for <WG1063> I have <WG2532> written a letter <WG1989> unto you <WG5213> in <WG1223> few words. <WG1024>
Know <WG1097> ye that our brother <WG80> Timothy <WG5095> is set at liberty; <WG630> with <WG3326> whom, <WG3739> if <WG1437> he come <WG2064> shortly, <WG5032> I will see <WG3700> you. <WG5209>

Salute <WG782> all <WG3956> them that have the rule over <WG2233> you, <WG5216> and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> saints. <WG40> They <WG3588> of <WG575> Italy <WG2482> salute <WG782> you. <WG5209>
Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG281>
